contentBlocks.title: General Water Heating Requirements
paragraphs: Water heating systems must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Water heating systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Water heating systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Water heating systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Water heating systems must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Water heating systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.
Water heating systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Water heating systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Water heating systems must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Water heating systems must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Water heating systems must be suitable for the intended use of the building.
Water heating systems must be installed by a qualified person.
